name: Tetro (charon25)
description:
This game is my entry for the Weekly Game Jam 160 on the theme "Nothing stays forever".

In this little puzzle game, you must connect points on a grid by linking adjacent tiles, but do it with care : the tiles start disappearing after you placed too much, breaking the links ! Thank you for playing, and if you enjoyed it, please leave a comment and consider rating it !

It's made entirely in Visual Basic .NET. I created all the code and the graphics, but the credits for others assets are here : 

Font : 

  • http://www.pentacom.jp/pentacom/bitfontmaker2/gallery/?id=102

SFX : 

  • https://kenney.nl/
  • https://freesound.org/people/Kastenfrosch/sounds/162473/
  • https://freesound.org/people/maxmakessounds/sounds/353546/
  • http://www.gameburp.com/free-game-sound-fx/

Music by Eric Matyas (www.soundimage.org)
